newsitem.title: JAPAN: BOJ says need act quickly on negative price effect.
newsitem.headline: BOJ says need act quickly on negative price effect.

text.p: Bank of Japan (BOJ) Governor Yasuo Matsushita said on Thursday it was important for the central bank to act promptly if negative effects appeared on the economy from asset price movements and prices in general.
Matsushita told a parliamentary committee that from past experience of the "bubble" economy, the BOJ had learned it should not neglect price monitoring.
He added that if asset prices and prices in general have a negative effect on the economy "it is important to take prompt steps".
He added: "We would like to use what we have learned (from the bubble) in our future monetary policy management."
